are_you_sure_logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
delete_account_warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
delete_account_not_implemented: Delete account feature not implemented yet
rate_us_message: If you enjoy using our lottery app, please take a moment to rate us! Your feedback helps us improve and reach more users.
rate_us_subtitle: Tap to rate us on Google Play Store
feedback_message: I would like to give feedback about the app
report_problem_message: I would like to report a problem
auth_error: User already exists or invalid number
claim_steps_description: Follow these steps to claim your lottery prize
verify_ticket_description: Check your lottery ticket number against the official results on the Kerala Lottery website.
prize_collection_time_description: Submit your winning ticket within 30 days of the draw. After 30 days, tickets expire and prizes cannot be claimed.
where_to_claim_description:
For prizes up to ₹5,000: Claim at any lottery shop
For prizes up to ₹1 Lakh: Claim at district lottery offices
For prizes above ₹1 Lakh: Claim at Directorate of State Lotteries, Thiruvananthapuram
tax_deduction_description: For prizes above ₹10,000, Income Tax and Surcharge will be deducted at source as per government regulations.
bank_account_details: Bank account details for prize transfer
website_launch_error: Could not open website. Please try again.
prize_claim_help: I need help with claiming my lottery prize
claim_assistance: I need assistance with the prize claim process
lottery_info_request: I need information about lottery results and prizes
scan_instruction: Scan the barcode on your lottery ticket to get results
scan_proper_ticket: Please scan a proper lottery ticket barcode.
gallery_scan_info: Image-based barcode scanning feature will be available soon. Please use the camera scanner for now.
gallery_error: Could not access gallery. Please try again.
date_updated_scanner_ready: Date updated! Scanner is ready for new scan.
change_date_to_rescan: If wrong date was selected, change the date above to scan the same ticket again.
please_wait_verifying: Please wait while we verify your lottery ticket.
bank_details_required: For prizes above ₹10,000, bank details are required.
current_result_pending_won_previous: Current result pending - You won in previous draw
no_current_result_no_previous_prize: No current result & no previous prize
no_current_result_no_previous_win: Not today’s result, and no prize in last result
better_luck_next_draw: Better luck in the next draw!
check_back_later_for_result: Check back later when the result is published
previous_win_note: This prize is from a previous draw. Current result not yet published.
no_results_selected_date: No lottery results found for selected date
select_lottery_result_message: Please select a lottery result to view details.
saved_results_description: Your saved lottery results will appear here
confirm_clear_all_message: Are you sure you want to remove all saved results? This action cannot be undone.
cannot_undo_message: Cannot undo - please save from the original result
enter_search_term: Enter a search term to find saved results
dont_forget_check_results: Don't forget to check the results at 3 PM.
reminder_check_ticket: Reminder: Check WIN WIN W-754 ticket result.
new_claim_procedure: New procedure for claiming prizes above ₹1 Lakh.
update_features_message: Update to get new features and improvements.
feature_under_development: This feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!
tap_generate_lucky_numbers: Tap generate to get your lucky numbers
disclaimer_content: Lotto App does not represent any government entity. We are not affiliated with any government organization and do not facilitate government services through this app. Our source of information is publicly available data, including official government websites. Users are advised to cross-check all information, including potential winnings, with the official government gazette for confirmation. Please note, this app does not sell lottery tickets and only displays lottery-related data.
prediction_disclaimer_content: Our app offers lottery predictions based on past data and analysis. However, lottery results are random, and no prediction can guarantee a win. Use our predictions as a guide, but play responsibly and understand that winning is based on chance. Our aim is to enhance your lottery experience with useful data and insights.
responsibility_content: Users are solely responsible for verifying all information independently. Always confirm results with official sources before making any claims. Gambling can be addictive - please play responsibly and within your means.
data_source_content: All lottery data is sourced from publicly available official websites and government publications. We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, but cannot guarantee 100% accuracy. Always verify with official sources.
important_notice_content: This app is for informational purposes only. Please gamble responsibly and never bet more than you can afford to lose. If you have a gambling problem, seek professional help.
video_play_youtube_notice: This will open the video in YouTube app or browser for the best viewing experience.
latest_version_message: You are using the latest version
ai_analysis_description: Our advanced AI system analyzes millions of lottery data points using machine learning algorithms to identify patterns and predict the most probable winning numbers.
data_structure_description: We use sophisticated data structures like binary trees, hash tables, and neural networks to efficiently process and analyze historical lottery data.
historical_analysis_description: The system examines years of lottery results to identify recurring patterns, frequency distributions, and number sequences that have higher probability of occurrence.
pattern_recognition_description: Advanced pattern recognition algorithms detect hidden correlations between winning numbers, dates, and other factors that influence lottery outcomes.
step_1_description: Scan or enter your lottery ticket number using the camera or manual input
step_2_description: Our AI analyzes the number against historical data and patterns
step_3_description: Get a probability percentage and detailed analysis of your number's winning potential
probability_disclaimer: Note: This is a probability analysis based on historical data. Lottery outcomes are random and no system can guarantee winning results.
failed_to_analyze_ticket: Failed to analyze ticket. Please try again.
